title: Constructivist Language Learning Design Based on Web 2.0

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education theories and experience applying digital tools
context.additional_context: Adult learner environment for working professionals studying after work hours, utilizing diverse devices in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting

learning_goals: Learners can design a collaborative language content creation process using Web 2.0 tools.
Learners can plan and operate non-real-time online discussion activities based on constructivist principles.
Learners can develop language learning scenarios considering the synchronous/asynchronous characteristics of Web 2.0 technologies.

resources: Web 2.0 Collaboration Tools (Padlet, Google Workspace, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
